Verb TO BE

Is it true? Write TRUE sentences, positive or negative. Use is / isn't / are / aren't.
notFilledOut: Please fill in all blanks to view solution
a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.

questions:
1) (Russia / a big country) *Russia is a big country*

2) (Diamonds / cheap) *Diamonds aren't cheap/Diamonds are not cheap*

3) (Bogota / in Antioquia) *Bogota isn't in Antioquia/Bogota is not in Antioquia*

4) (Gabriel Garcia Marquez / from Colombia) *Gabriel Garcia Marquez is from Colombia*

5) (Elephants / small) *Elephants aren't small/Elephants are not small*

6) (The Himalayas mountains / very high) *The Himalayas mountains are very high*

7) (The Pacific ocean / very large) *The Pacific ocean is very large*

8) (Vallenato music / from Boyaca) *Vallenato music isn't from Boyaca/Vallenato music is not from Boyaca*
